title: AWS AI IDE, AgentCore throw down gauntlets for Microsoft
description: Kiro emerges as a significant alternative to GitHub Copilot agents, while AWS AgentCore updates square off against Agent 365 in the battle for enterprise AI development.
content: Updates to an AI IDE and AgentCore platform bolster AWS's stance in its fierce competition for enterprise AI development against Microsoft and other AI coding competitors, according to industry obser… [+8046 chars]
